Text.Name: JuQing_dialogue_2
Text.Nodes.2.Text: … (This man before you has a chiseled face, features accentuated by his dark eyebrows and large eyes. Dressed in old-time outfits, he doesn't seem like someone from our time. The man sits in meditation without any movement, as if frozen in time. If it weren't for the slightest sense of life, he could have been a very well-crafted jade statue.)
Text.Nodes.3.Text: … (This man seems to have sensed your existence, and with a long sigh, he leisurely wakes from his meditation.)
